numlitem.para: There is no evidence of leakage, and
Alternate procedures are used to prevent water accumulation in associated tank.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "SUMP DRAIN VALVE FOR ___ TANK INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: See illustration for location of fuel sump drain valves.
Visually inspect exterior of associated valve for evidence of fuel leakage.
Use alternate procedures to prevent water accumulation in the associated tank.

note.para: One alternate procedure is to check the refuel service equipment for moisture accumulation before and after each refuel operation.
